attributes.action: Get UK roads to a better standard.
attributes.additional_details: I cannot think of any 'A' or 'B' roads that are smooth and free of damage. Can you?
attributes.background: Potholed, flooded, unfinished roads that have been unfinished for years and general terrible standard of so called finished roads.

rejection.details:
The responsibility for the maintenance and repair of roads is divided between Highways England for motorways and major A roads and local authorities for local roads.  

If you wanted to ask the Government to provide more funding to Highways England and local authorities specifically for road repair, you could submit a petition about that.
